participant_1.background:
I am not wealthy, but I am comfortable.
i like to sew my own clothing.
i usually catch sunfish.
I will be enjoying my time off with my family and friends.
I keep my hair a dark brown, so it doesn't show the sweat from my workouts.

participant_2.background:
My pets are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion.
My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.
I'm a 25-year-old female who loves the Fourth of July because the fireworks are so beautiful, but I'm scared of left turns.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
i commute by bus.

content.text: Hi, I am going to go fishing with my family and friends. I usually catch sunfish. How about you?
I do not fish often, but I love to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble. I also like to eat at the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.
That sounds fun. I love to sew my own clothing, and I keep my hair a dark brown, so it doesn't show the sweat from my workouts. I am not wealthy, but I am comfortable.

That is cool. I am a 25-year-old female who loves the Fourth of July because the fireworks are so beautiful, but I'm scared of left turns. I have two dogs and a cat, and they are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion.
That is great. I love animals, but I do not have any pets of my own right now. I am looking forward to spending my time off with my family and friends.
That sounds like a great plan. I hope you have a wonderful time!
